Title: Swingtown
Actors: Jack Davenport, Molly Parker, Lana Parrilla, Grant Show, Miriam Shor, Aaron Howles, Britt Robertson, Josh Hopkins, Shanna Collins
Plot: As America celebrates its 200th birthday, two generations of friends and neighbors in a Chicago suburb explore new freedoms and seek connections with each other in the midst of the socio/sexual revolution.
